headline: Citigroup Announces $650 Million Redemption of Floating Rate Notes Due 2026
summary: NEW YORK, June 16, 2025--Citigroup Inc. is announcing the redemption, in whole, constituting $650,000,000 of its Floating Rate Notes due 2026 (the "notes") (ISIN: US172967MB43).

headline: Many Exporters No Longer Want Dollars, US Bank Executive Says
